listening_blindfold_key1:
Skills: Speaking, Listenig
Group Size: Pairs
Time Limit: 30 minutes
listening_blindfold_key3: Each person of the team will become "Follower" and "Leader" one by one.
listening_blindfold_key4: The “Follower” will be blindfolded and will need to accomplish an easy transfer task, such as take a pen and put it on a certain person’s laptop.
listening_blindfold_key5: The “Leader” will be given a task card and is responsible to help the “Follower” get to the destination successfully.
listening_blindfold_key6: When the “Follower” successfully accomplishes the task, they reverse the roles and repeat the same process.
